Measure.name: predefined-complex-queries
Measure.description: Provides a number of predefined queries for an archimate repository : Avg_ImportanceScore.eol, NumberOfBusinessElements.eol, Max_ImportanceScore.eol, NumberOfTechnologyElements.eol, Median_ImportanceScore.eol, Quartile1_ImportanceScore.eol, Min_ImportanceScore.eol, Quartile3_ImportanceScore.eol, NumberOfApplicationElements.eol
